PAGE.TITLE: Project
PAGE.CONTENT:
Computation
Durée = Travail ÷ Unités de ressource
Types of tasks
What is the value modified by Project when another one is modified?
modified value
durationunitsworkload
type of taskfixed duration
Durée fixeworkloadworkloadworkload
fixed capacity
Capacité fixe
(default)workloaddurationduration
fixed workload
Travail fixeunitsdurationduration
The default type can be defined in OutilsOptions…PrévisionsType de tâche par défaut :
Previsions driven by the effort
When a task is effort driven:
fixed duration
Durée fixewhen adding/removing resources, their efforts are updated
fixed capacity
Capacité fixe
(default)when adding/removing resources, the duration is updated
fixed workload
Travail fixethe effort driven prevision cannot be switched off
The default flag value can be defined in OutilsOptions…PrévisionsLes nouvelles tâches sont pilotées par l'effort
Resources
Define days off for the whole team
OutilsModifier le temps de travail…
Select Standard (Calendrier du projet) calendar
Select the days
Click on Chômé
Define days off for a team member
OutilsModifier le temps de travail…
Select the person in the Pour: calendar dropdown list
Select the days
Click on Chômé
Task parameters (for Excel import/export)
for the tasks
N°task number
Récapitulative(not editable)
flag indicating if the task is a summary or not (can be "Oui" or "Non")
Critique(not editable)
flag indicating if the task is on the critical path or not (can be "Oui" or "Non")
Niveau Hiérarchiquehierarchical level (1, 2… the task is considered to be inside the previous task having the level equal to l-1)
Prédécesseurspredecessor tasks defined by their numbers (separated by ";", empty string if there is no predecessor task)
Successeurssuccessor tasks defined by their numbers (separated by ";", empty string if there is no predecessor task)
Nomname of the task
Duréeduration
Travailworkload ("j" → days, "h" → hours)
Travail restantremaining workload
% achevéPercentage of done work
DébutStart date
FinEnd Date
Remarque?
Unité d'affectation?
Typetype of task (can be "Capacité fixe", "Durée fixe", or "Travail fixe")
Pilotée par l'efforteffort driven (can be "Oui" or "Non")
Noms resourcesresource names (with the syntax "res1;res2[50%]")
Jalonflag indicating if it is a jalon or not (can be "Oui" or "Non", default is "Non")
L'audit peut fractionnerflag indicating if the task can be split by the audit (can be "Oui" or "Non", default is "Oui")
Prioritépriority (integer)
for the resources
for the affectations
The import does not work properly if the Excel cells contains newlines (the text of these cells is not imported).
If the column titles are the correct ones in Excel, Project will automatically recognize them
User Interface
Indicate that task β is linked to a task α
on the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the graphical view
put the cursor on top of task α
left click
move the cursor toward the top or the bottom
move the cursor on top of task β
release the mouse button
on the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the table view
select the tasks (e.g. by using click)
(it is possible to link more than two tasks; in this case, there are linked one after the other)
type
Unlink tasks
On the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the graphical view
double click on the dependence arrow
click on the Supprimer button of the displayed dialog
on the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the table view
select the tasks (e.g. by using click)
type
On the Organigramme des tâches view
put the cursor on top of task α
left click
move the cursor on top of task β
release the mouse button
Change the task orders:
on the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the table view
select one or several lines
drag 'n drop the top limit of the tasks
Display the durations in days instead of hours:
set OutilsOptions…PrévisionsAfficher la durée en : to Jours
Display the workloads in days instead of hours:
set OutilsOptions…PrévisionsAfficher le travail en : to Jours
Display all the subtasks
in the Mise en forme toolbar, AfficherToutes les tâches subordonnées
Shortcuts
(Microsoft listhttp://office.microsoft.com/en-us/project/HP453045851033.aspx
enHTML) on the Diagramme de Gantt view, in the table view
insert a task before the selected one
delete the selected tasks
edit the field
double right click
display the task editor
center the view on the first selected task
link the selected tasks
display the affectation window
outdent task
indent task
(numeric pad)
hide subtaks
(numeric pad)
show subtasks
scroll calendar toward the past
scroll calendar toward the future
Viewers
GANTT Projecthttp://ganttproject.biz
enHTML is able to load a Project file but this is buggy (it ignores the start date imposed to tasks, the dates are not the same as in MS Project…).
AdeptTrackerhttp://www.adepttracker.net
enHTML is able to load a Project XML file (it can also load a mpp file if MS Project is installed).
Seavus Project Viewerhttp://www.seavusprojectviewer.com
enHTML seems to be a good viewer and is cheap (40$).
